message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $140. This is a high-quality item that I believe would be a great addition to your collection.
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer but that price is a bit high for me. Would you consider $100?
I appreciate your interest in our product, Bob. To better accommodate your budget, I am willing to negotiate. How about we meet in the middle at $110 for the product?
